text.section: The commission members may decide among themselves those voluntary actions which enhance state efforts to properly educate, train, and reeducate Kentucky's present and future workforce, to the end that all adult Kentuckians who are willing and able to work are employed within the Commonwealth in good jobs of their choosing.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 322, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992.
